description.value:
Activation: *

You project resolve, and even powerful groups of opponents find it hard to focus their attention elsewhere.

When you use your @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.yFWkmaGMs359A7DB]{Valiant Intervention}, you can spend focus up to your ranks in Leadership to target that many additional characters.

Additionally, after you affect a target with Valiant Intervention, they can’t make @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.QpFIxaoCBezzt6yw]{Reactive Strikes} against your allies until the end of that target’s next turn.
